subject: Football
Deaths (Obituaries)
lead_paragraph: Nicknamed Wham Bam, Mr. Van Buren was ahead of his time in the 1940s, combining power and speed while leading the Philadelphia Eagles to two championships.
snippet: Nicknamed Wham Bam, Mr. Van Buren was ahead of his time in the 1940s, combining power and speed while leading the Philadelphia Eagles to two championships.
